评论详情: Really good for party favors!! I put them on the tables for everyone to grab!!

Our son's elementary school does not allow children to distribute candy on Valentine's Day, which is a bummer. We’ve had to come up with creative alternatives for Valentine's greetings. So, we decided to go with an 80s theme and made retro cassette tapes and attached these sunglasses. They were a huge hit. Kids really seemed to like them. All except for one of the glasses arrived unbroken. Our son still loves playing with his glasses, and they even came in handy for an 80s themed birthday party my older son attended last week.
These were purchased for an alumni party ans worked out great! They are sturdy and big enough for adults. We used them as decoration and they added a lot of bright colors to the tables.
When I'm on stage performing, I offer 1 or 2 kids these glasses. And then of course everyone wants so I have tons for everyone, it's great!
Bought for a class project. Quality isn't great, but for the price they were perfect.
Used for a party game, did what they were supposed to do. Good price for a big box.
